title: Pointless Watch Face
summary: A pointless and redundant analog watch face, just for fun!
description: You might have seen this kind of watch face on the internet many times. It has been posted to 9gag, reddit, tumblr and many other pages for years, and now you can use this watch face on your Android Wearable.Are your friends able to read this watch on the first shot? or the stranger who asks for the time?or You?A redundant analog watch face which is telling you what time it is by showing how the hands of the clock would look like at that time of the day. It is good practice for your brain while a fun way to have something different than an average watch face.
descriptionHTML:
You might have seen this kind of watch face on the internet many times. It has been posted to 9gag, reddit, tumblr and many other pages for years, and now you can use this watch face on your Android Wearable.

Are your friends able to read this watch on the first shot?
or the stranger who asks for the time?
or You?

A redundant analog watch face which is telling you what time it is by showing how the hands of the clock would look like at that time of the day. It is good practice for your brain while a fun way to have something different than an average watch face.
